text: Polyrhaphis hystricina is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Henry Walter Bates in 1862. It is known from Brazil and French Guiana.BioLib.cz - Polyrhaphis hystricina. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1862
title: Polyrhaphis hystricina
